${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:DatabaseTablet.NAME: Database Tablet
${modID}:DatabaseTablet.FLAVOR: A holographic tablet for all your research needs.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, choose #b1 card in your hand to add to #yExhaust. If you do, draw #b1 card.
